comment.author: 14350023@N07
comment._content: If this is the Overbrook School for the Blind in Philly, this photo is dated wrong or named later. The school didn't change its name to Overbrook School for the Blind until 1946. It was called Pennsylvania Institute for the Instruction of the Blind until then. Maybe everyone called it Overbrook anyway? www.obs.org
